/api/users/validate.get: Checks Bearer token for validity.  Returns success or failure.

/api/users/:_id.get: Returns user with a specific ID that is supplied in the url.

/api/users/register.post: Takes a username and password in the form {username, password} and saves a new user to the database.

/api/users/login.post: Takes a username and password in the form {username, password}, and returns {success: true} if the credentials match a user in the database and {success: false} if they do not.
